replies.body: I'd like to help, but I need more info!  When did your client crash?  Were there any error messages?  Let me know with some more info, plos!

You might be having driver or hardware problems that's not rending the game properly, which would end up in a bugsplat error.  I recommend using our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) to help get this resolved.  Specifically, make sure that all of your drivers are up to date as an important piece.  Hopefully, this will do the trick!
